benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.description: What will we gain from transitioning to the new model?

hero.title: About the Idea
hero.description: The idea behind "Dream Team" is to create a new political system based on direct democracy, full transparency, and governmental professionalism.

problems.title: Problems in the Current System
problems.description: The Israeli political system suffers from several structural problems that prevent it from functioning efficiently.

trustCrisis.title: Trust Crisis
trustCrisis.description: Public trust in the political system is at an all-time low.

instability.title: Instability
instability.description: Short-term governments that fail to implement long-term policies.

misrepresentation.title: Inadequate Representation
misrepresentation.description: The party system does not faithfully represent the will of the public.

lackOfTransparency.title: Lack of Transparency
lackOfTransparency.description: Decision-making processes are closed and not transparent to the public.

solutions.title: Our Solution
solutions.description: An innovative model combining direct democracy with governmental professionalism.

directElection.title: Direct Election of Ministers
directElection.description: Citizens directly elect ministers, independent of political parties.

regionalRepresentation.title: District Representation
regionalRepresentation.description: 12 electoral districts ensuring adequate representation for each region.

fullTransparency.title: Full Transparency
fullTransparency.description: Every candidate discloses all required information to the public.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.description: Appointments based on qualifications, not political considerations.

howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.description: A simple and transparent process for electing the government.

step1.title: Platform Registration
step1.description: Citizens register on the platform with full identity verification.

step2.title: Completing the Matching Questionnaire
step2.description: 100 questions allowing for precise matching with candidates.

step3.title: Selecting the Dream Team
step3.description: Choosing the most suitable candidates for each role.

step4.title: Voting and Determining Results
step4.description: Democratic voting and determination of the new government.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: "We envision a future where every citizen in Israel can directly influence governance, where transparency is the norm, not the exception, and where professionalism guides decision-making. This is a future of true, efficient, and accountable democracy."

cta.title: Let's Make the Vision a Reality
cta.description: Join us in creating the democratic future of Israel.
